pages.text:
about
fck
Just A
Taste
Of
Puddle Jumpers
Lakeside Grill
Welcome to Puddle Jumpers Lakeside Grill, where great food, refreshing drinks, and stunning waterfront views come together for an unforgettable dining experience. Located in Downtown Tavares, our restaurant offers casual lakeside dining with a laid-back bar ambiance, perfect for locals and visitors alike. Whether you're here to enjoy live music, a delicious meal, or a signature cocktail, we’re dedicated to making every visit special.
                                    Overlooking Lake Dora and the Tavares Seaplane Base, Puddle Jumpers is the perfect place to relax and unwind. Our diverse menu features mouthwatering burgers, fresh seafood, crisp salads, and handcrafted specialty drinks—including our famous Lake Dora Iced Tea. With friendly service and a welcoming atmosphere, we strive to provide a comfortable, enjoyable experience for everyone who walks through our doors.
Banquets
Looking for the perfect venue? Our private banquet room is available seven days a week for birthday parties, baby showers, weddings, corporate events, and holiday gatherings. Whether you're celebrating with friends or hosting a business event, our team is here to make your occasion seamless and memorable.
At Puddle Jumpers, we take pride in offering lunch, dinner, and late-night bites, all served with spectacular lakeside views. Join us for a casual meal on our covered patio, watch the seaplanes take off and land, or sip on a refreshing drink while enjoying the Florida breeze. We can't wait to welcome you—stop by today or check out our site to learn more!
